snippet: HARRIS--Kate Webb. The board and staff of the Metropolitan Opera Guild are deeply saddened by the death of our longtime board member, Kitty Webb Harris. Kitty joined our board in 1986, and was a devoted supporter of our educational programs. She also served as the Guild's Board Secretary with distinction from 1993 through 2001. We will miss her enthusiasm and warmth, and send our condolences to her daughter, Amanda, and son, Jonathan. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HARRIS--Kate Webb. The board and staff of the Metropolitan Opera Guild are deeply saddened by the death of our longtime board member, Kitty Webb Harris. Kitty joined our board in 1986, and was a devoted supporter of our educational programs. She also served as the Guild's Board Secretary with distinction from 1993 through 2001. We will miss her enthusiasm and warmth, and send our condolences to her daughter, Amanda, and son, Jonathan. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HARRIS, KATE WEBB
